name: Great Canadian Donair Burger
description: Another way to enjoy Donair! Bring the classic right to your own backyard, with an homage to the flavours we all know and love from our favourite late-night takeout joint, now with a grilled-to-perfection twist. And don’t forget the Big Burger Sauce!
preparation: In large bowl, combine seasoning with beef, water, and eggs until well blended. Form into eight patties.
Grill, with lid closed, 5–6 min per side or until an instantread thermometer inserted into centre reads 160° F.
Meanwhile, shred lettuce; thinly slice tomatoes and onion.
Place patty on bun; top with tomatoes, onion, and lettuce.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 tbsp Big Burger Sauce or BBQ sauce and 1 cup side salad.

products.name: Donair Seasoning (Pack of 3)
summary: Any way you name it – gyro, shawarma, donair, or doner kebab – our Donair Seasoning is what you’re looking for. You won’t believe how easy it is to make the street food staple at home in minutes with this blend and a few simple ingredients. Just add the seasoning to ground beef, press it into a Rectangular Steamer and cook it in the microwave for 10 minutes or the oven for 60. Slice thinly and serve on a pita with fresh veggies and tzatziki – dinner is done!

products.name: 3-in-1 Burger Press
summary: Press perfectly shaped patties, stuffed burgers, and sliders with this non-stick 3-in-1 Burger Press. A great addition to a build-your-own-burger bar, switch up the protein – try beef, chicken, turkey, salmon, or veg – and fillings to make your burger your way!
